parse.title: List of English-medium Schools in Bangladesh

text.*:
This is a list of English-medium schools in Bangladesh. The syllabus most common in usage is the Edexcel and Cambridge. Other syllabi are also used, although rarely.

Name Location Syllabus Est. Levels Admission Period
French International School of Dhaka Embassy Road, Plot 13, Baridhara, Dhaka-1212 French and English. French official program from preschool to high school. 1987 Pre-Kindergarten Through Grade 12
Sydney International School[1] House # 08, Road # 09, Block # J, Baridhara, Dhaka-1212 Board of Studies, Teaching and Educational Standards (BOSTES) and Cambridge curriculum for O'level 2011 Preschool to O'level
Mirpur International Tutorial House-16, Sec-2, Block-D, Ave-2, Mirpur, Dhaka-1216 Edexcel curriculum 2003 July–June, January–December
Kids Tutorial[2] 7/A Circuit House Rd, Ramna, Shantinagar, Dhaka- 1000 Edexcel curriculum 1987 Playgroup to O'level June–July, November–December
St. Peters School of London Dhanmondi Branch: Road-7A, House-74/A, Dhanmondi, Dhaka-1209

Uttara Branch: House # 22, Sector#13(Opposite of Agora)

British curriculum 2012 July–June
Vision Global School House-17,Road-10,Gulshan-1,Dhaka-1212 Edexcel curriculum 2010 Playgroup to A Level June -July
International Turkish Hope School, Dhaka[3] Main Branch: Plot-7, Road-6, Sector-4 Uttara, Dhaka-1230 Cambridge curriculum 1996 Playgroup to A'level July–June
Daffodil International School[4] Permanent Campus: House-71, Road-9/A, Dhanmondi, Dhaka-1209

Uttara Branch: House-3, Shonargaon Janapath, Sector-12, Uttara Model Town, Uttara, Dhaka-1230

Edexcel curriculum 2009 Playgroup to A Level July–June

Islami Bank International School & College[5] 225 Senpara Parbata, Mirpur, Dhaka-1216 Edexcel curriculum 1999 Play Group to O' Level January–December
Cardiff International School Dhaka (CISD)[6] Senior Section: House # 60/A, Road # 27 (old), 16 (new), Junior Section: House: 2/9, Block- D, Lalmatia, Dhaka-1207 The pre-school curriculum of IPC (USA), a Primary curriculum of IPC (UK) and CIPP, CGE O and A Level curricula of Cambridge 2013 Play Group to A' Level July–June
Scholastica Uttara, Mirpur, Gulshan & Dhanmondi Cambridge curriculum 1977 Playgroup- A Level June
Green Dale International School, Dhaka[7] Senior Campus: House#8, Road#83
